message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $140 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm interested in purchasing, but I'd like to propose a price of $130.  This is still a fair price for both of us and allows me to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $135. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $135 is still slightly outside my budget. I'm prepared to pay $132, and I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product and my financial constraints.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I've considered your position and am willing to accept $132 for the product. I believe this is a mutually beneficial solution.
